title: Day 798
content:
# Day 798

The day is filled with countless distractions, and I often find myself wondering just how many times I check my phone within a 24-hour period. It's likely more frequent than I'd care to admit. I estimate it's around 240 times a day, which translates to an astonishing average of once every 6 minutes. This realization is both staggering and humbling.

Ironically, I got distracted even while composing this. Perhaps it's time to seek some guidance from ChatGPT to help me find my way to a moment of meditation.

![](https://miro.medium.com/0*uW-w00GlHDhTXe3w.jpg)

I love this statement. Zooming out seems to help me find the zen.

5/28/24

Conor Jay Chepenik
